mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(USID) AS CNT FROM TSY_USER_MNG WHERE USE_YN = 'Y' AND USID = #{user_id}
SELECT CASE WHEN #{password} = USER_PSWD THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS USER_CHECK FROM TSY_USER_MNG WHERE USE_YN = 'Y' AND USID = #{user_id}

SELECT A.USID AS USID /* 사용자ID */ , A.USER_NM AS USER_NM /* 사용자명 */ , A.DPNM AS DPNM /* 부서명 */ , A.AUTH_TC AS AUTH_TC /* 메뉴권한 그룹코드 */ , A.ING_COND_TC AS ING_COND_TC /* 조회조건구분코드(조합,중앙회 조회범위) */ , A.ASCN_C AS ASCN_C /* 조합코드 */ , CASE WHEN A.BR_C BETWEEN '041' AND '049' THEN '도지회별 합산' ELSE CASE WHEN B.MO_BR_C='001' THEN '중앙회' ELSE '단위조합별 조회' END END AS ASCN_NM /* 조합명 */ , CASE WHEN A.BR_C BETWEEN '041' AND '049' THEN A.BR_C ELSE CASE WHEN B.MO_BR_C='001' THEN '001' ELSE A.BR_C END END AS BR_C /* 점소코드 */ , CASE WHEN A.BR_C BETWEEN '041' AND '049' THEN B.BR_NM ELSE CASE WHEN B.MO_BR_C='001' THEN '산림조합중앙회' ELSE B.BR_NM END END AS BR_NM /* 점소명 */ , B.BLNG_HQ_BR_C AS BLNG_HQ_BR_C /* 소속본부점소코드 */ , ( SELECT DTL_CLAS_VAL FROM TSY_CO_MNG WHERE CO_C = 'BATCH_BASE_DATE' AND USE_YN = 'Y' AND DTL_CLAS_VAL != '-' ) AS BASE_DATE /* 배치실행일자 */ , CASE WHEN B.BR_BUSI_CHAR_TC='10' THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS SUB_YN /* 10 이면 점소포함여부 표시 */ , CASE WHEN B.BR_TC IN ('03', '04') THEN '30' ELSE '10' END AS BR_TC /* 중앙회, 조합 구분 */ , B.ZONE_TC , A.BR_C AS ORG_BR_C FROM TSY_USER_MNG A , ( SELECT MO_BR_C , BR_C , BR_NM , BLNG_HQ_BR_C , BR_BUSI_CHAR_TC , BR_TC , ZONE_TC FROM TTL_BR_C_INFO WHERE MO_BR_C IS NOT NULL ) B WHERE USE_YN = 'Y' AND USID = #{user_id} AND A.BR_C = B.BR_C(+)
SELECT MO_BR_C , BR_C , BR_NM , BR_BUSI_CHAR_TC , BLNG_HQ_BR_C , CASE WHEN BR_TC IN ('03', '04') THEN '30' ELSE '10' END AS BR_TC , ZONE_TC FROM TTL_BR_C_INFO ORDER BY MO_BR_C , BR_C , BLNG_HQ_BR_C
